item.title: ğŸ¦… Human-Heron Detector
item.description: Welcome to the Human-Heron Detector! ğŸ‘‹ğŸ¦…ğŸ§ This project is a real-time detection application that uses YOLOv8 and a Streamlit interface to identify humans and herons. It is designed to provide seamless live detection and image processing capabilities. Detect Humans and Herons: Uses YOLOv8 to detect both humans and herons. Streamlit App: Image Upload: Upload custom images or choose from a gallery of pre-recorded images for detection. Download Annotated Results: Save images with bounding boxes drawn around detected objects.
